name: clean-architecture-api
description: Clean Architecture API with .NET Core, PostgreSQL, and Docker

scripts.docker:restart: dotnet ef database update --project src/CleanArchitecture.Infrastructure --startup-project src/CleanArchitecture.API
scripts.db:migrate:dev: cross-env ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development dotnet ef database update --project src/CleanArchitecture.Infrastructure --startup-project src/CleanArchitecture.API
scripts.db:migrate:prod: dotnet ef database update --project src/CleanArchitecture.Infrastructure --startup-project src/CleanArchitecture.API
scripts.db:add-migration: cross-env ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development dotnet ef migrations add --project src/CleanArchitecture.Infrastructure
scripts.db:remove-migration: cross-env ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development dotnet ef migrations remove --project src/CleanArchitecture.Infrastructure
scripts.db:drop: dotnet ef database drop --project src/CleanArchitecture.Infrastructure --startup-project src/CleanArchitecture.API --force
scripts.db:truncate: cross-env ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development dotnet run --project src/CleanArchitecture.API truncate
scripts.db:reset: cross-env ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development npm run db:truncate && npm run db:migrate:dev && npm run db:seed:all
scripts.setup: npm run restore && npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run db:migrate:dev
scripts.setup:dev: npm run restore && npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run db:migrate:dev
scripts.reset: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run db:migrate:dev

author: Clean Architecture Team
